hadiths.text: Narrated Sahl bin Sa`d:The Prophet (ﷺ) said to a man, "Have you got anything of the Qur'an?" The man said, "Yes, such-andsuch Sura, and such-and-such Sura," naming the Suras

chapter.ara-name: باب {قُلْ أَىُّ شَىْءٍ أَكْبَرُ شَهَادَةً قُلِ اللَّهُ}
chapter.eng-name: “Say ‘What thing is the most great in witness?’ Say: ‘Allah…’”
